dmca.title: TalismanCreations complains to Google of websites carrying claimed patent violations
dmca.body:
To: Google AdWords, DMCA	

Notes: Please note that there is another sight advertising on Google using the Talisman proprietary information. We are the holders of the patents, and would ask that any advertising on Google be suspended.
For your information, I include the following:
1- Search query -- Google
2- Infringing Sponsored Link -- http://www.myasyrohelpline.com/gold-talisman.html (copy attached)
3- Listing of United States Patents with numbers and date of patent. 
4- My email is info@talismancreations.com

I make the following statements:
A) I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials as described above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
B) I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Thank you in advance for your attention, and should you require further information, please contact me at the above e-mail address or telephone numbers.
Yours Truly

[signed]
[private]
TalismanCreations.com



//////////////////

[private]

From: [private][[private]@rbmarketinginc.com]
Sent: Monday, June 12, 2006 3:12 PM 
To: [private]@myastrohelpline.com
Subject: "The Talisman"



Dear Sir;

Please be advised that I am the solicitor for the holder of twelve patents pertaining to ornamental designs for a seires of Zodiac-based pendants known as "The Talisman".
I refer to your My Astro Helpline.com and in particular, those items under the heading "Cold Talisman for Zodiac Signs". In all material respects these items infringe upon our patent rights.
By this e-mail, it is hereby demanded of you to:
1. Forthwith cease to offer for sale any of the infringing products;
2. Delete the infringed products from all future sales materials (via any and all media);
3. Destroy any existing infringed product inventories and discontinue fabrication of same; and
4. Provide to us forthwith a full and accurate accounting of all infringed product sales to date, including number of pieces sold and gross revenues.

Your immediate and satisfactory response to this letter is requested. I insist that our propietary rights be enforced and its foregone revenues patriated.

Yours truly,

R & B Gems Marketing Inc,
[private]
Inhouse Solicitor
Voice - [private]
Faxe - [private]


TaiismanCreations.com
Listing of United States Patents
